amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to authorize not more than $5 million in grants for the National Medical Preparedness Consortium to standardize training, national health care policies, and standards of care for emergency medical professionals to prepare for mass casualties resulting from a terrorist event involving WMD.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.
By unanimous consent, the Johnson, E. B. amendment was withdrawn.
